## Tracing.stop() method

Stops a trace started with the `start` method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stop(): Promise<Buffer>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Buffer&gt;

Promise which resolves to buffer with trace data.
